review: I've had a Chromecast since it was released back in 2013.  I just recently bought a second TV so I picked up a second device to go with it.  Overall, I really do love it.  It makes it easy to watch Netflix, Youtube, WatchESPN, and a variety of other apps on TV using either an Android or iOS device.  I was really excited when Plex support came to the Chromecast.  Unfortunately, that is what causes me to give this four instead of five stars.When streaming with Plex (and if I'm being honest, sometimes Netflix), it will occassionally lose connectivity with the controlling device, resulting in the inability to stop or pause what you're watching.  When this happens you pretty much have to turn off the TV and wait a few seconds for the Chromecast to power down, then turn it back on and re-cast from the phone.Overall it's a great little device, especially if you don't want to deal with another remote like the Roku Stick or Fire Stick require.  I just wish it functioned at its best at all times.
